# isDaylightSavingTime

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver is currently using daylight saving time.

## Declaration

```swift
var isDaylightSavingTime: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

If [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the receiver is currently using daylight saving time, otherwise [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false]. This property invokes [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSTimeZone/isDaylightSavingTime(for:)] with the current date as the argument.

## Working with Daylight Savings

- **isDaylightSavingTime(for:)**: Indicates whether the receiver uses daylight saving time on a given date.
- **daylightSavingTimeOffset**: The current daylight saving time offset of the receiver.
- **daylightSavingTimeOffset(for:)**: Returns the daylight saving time offset for a given date.
- **nextDaylightSavingTimeTransition**: The date of the next daylight saving time transition for the receiver.
- **nextDaylightSavingTimeTransition(after:)**: Returns the next daylight saving time transition after a given date.
